location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Mr Woodhead, Master of the ElizaCountry Ship

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, reports the death of Belall Seed [former crew member on the Eliza]. Bruce enquires about the indentures of the free mariners, stating that it is necessary to know whether Woodhead and his officers are sealing [sailing] under the authority of the Acts of Parliament.
